TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DateBoldEventHandler(object sender, DateBoldEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DateBoldEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DateBoldEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DateBoldEventArgs)
public delegate void DateBoldEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DateBoldEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: Objeto que contiene los datos del evento.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará un evento interno del control .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle an internal event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
